data.name: EntityDoesNotExistInDatabase
data.value: The record you're looking for doesn't exist in database.
data.comment: Entitet koji tražite ne postoji u bazi podataka.

data.name: ConcurrencyException
data.value: This record has been modified or deleted by another user.
data.comment: Entitet je izmenjen ili izbrisan u međuvremenu od strane drugog korisnika, pokušajte ponovo.

data.name: EntityDoesNotExistInDatabaseForDeleteRequest
data.value: Your deletion request couldn't be completed as the entity doesn't exist in our database. Maybe it's already deleted.
data.comment: Vaš zahtev za brisanje nije uspeo, jer entitet ne postoji u našoj bazi podataka. Možda je obrisan u međuvremenu.

data.name: GlobalError
data.value: An error occurred in the system, our team has been informed and will fix it as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience. Error code:
data.comment: Dogodila se greška u sistemu, naš tim je obavešten i otkloniće je u najkraćem mogućem roku. Hvala Vam na strpljenju. Kod greške:

data.name: Password
data.value: Password
data.comment: Šifra

data.name: UserExcel
data.value: Users
data.comment: Korisnici

data.name: RoleExcel
data.value: Roles
data.comment: Uloge

data.name: NotificationExcel
data.value: Notifications
data.comment: Notifikacije

data.name: UnauthorizedAccessExceptionMessage
data.value: You don't have the necessary rights to perform the operation.
data.comment: Nemate potrebnu dozvolu da biste izvršili operaciju.

data.name: ExpiredVerificationCodeException
data.value: Your verification code has expired. Please request a new code to continue.
data.comment: Vaš verifikacioni kod je istekao. Zatražite novi kod da biste nastavili.

data.name: LatestVerificationCodeException
data.value: Please use the most recent verification code, as multiple codes were sent.
data.comment: Poslato je više verifikacionih kodova, molimo Vas da unesete poslednji.

data.name: ExpiredRefreshTokenException
data.value: Your session has expired, please login again.
data.comment: Vaša sesija je istekla, molimo Vas da se prijavite ponovo.

data.name: TwoDifferentIpAddressesRefreshException
data.value: You can't use the application with two different IP addresses at the same time, please login again.
data.comment: Ne možete da koristite aplikaciju sa dve različite IP adrese u isto vreme, molimo vas da se prijavite ponovo.

data.name: OnlyThirdPartyAccountButTriedToLoginException
data.value: Your account already exists with third-party (eg. Google) authentication. If you want to set up a password as well, please use the 'Forgot password?' option to reset it or log in to your profile and add a password.
data.comment: Vaš nalog je već registrovan putem treće strane (npr. Google). Ako želite da dodate i lozinku, koristite opciju „Zaboravili ste lozinku?”, ili se prijavite na profil i postavite lozinku.

data.name: SameEmailAlreadyExistsException
data.value: An account with this email address already exists.
data.comment: Nalog sa ovom email adresom već postoji.

data.name: DisabledAccountException
data.value: Your account is disabled, please contact the administrator.
data.comment: Vaš nalog je trenutno blokiran. Obratite se administratoru za pomoć.

data.name: AuthenticationEmailDoesNotExistException
data.value: An account with the entered email address does not exist. Please check the email address or create a new account.
data.comment: Nalog sa unetom email adresom ne postoji. Molimo vas da proverite unesenu adresu ili kreirate novi nalog.

data.name: AuthenticationIncorectPasswordException
data.value: Incorrect password. Please try again or reset your password if you've forgotten it.
data.comment: Pogrešna lozinka. Molimo vas da pokušate ponovo ili resetujete lozinku ako ste je zaboravili.

data.name: ResetPasswordEmailDoesNotExistException
data.value: An account with the entered email address does not exist. Please check the email address or create a new account.
data.comment: Nalog sa unetom email adresom ne postoji. Molimo vas da proverite unesenu adresu ili kreirate novi nalog.

data.name: EmailAccountVerificationTitle
data.value: Account verification
data.comment: Verifikacija naloga
